sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; function CompanyDetailsView({ company }) { // null check if (!company) { return null; } return (
ID:{company.id}

{`${company.name}`}

本社所在地

{company.headquarters}

設立年月日

{company.establishmentDate}

従業員数

{company.numberOfEmployees}

事業内容

{company.businessDescription}

沿革

{company.history}
削除
); } CompanyDetailsView.propTypes = { company: PropTypes.object, }; export default CompanyDetailsView;
